connectAccountsInstructionText: Svend needs your financial data, such as your account and transaction history, to provide you with personalized financial advice
connectPlaidAccountsInstructionText: Automatically connect to your bank(s) via our partner Plaid (recommended)
connectManualAccountsInstructionText: Manually enter your account information (or upload a CSV file) to provide your financial data
connectManualAccountsUploadCSVInstructio: Import your institutions, accounts, and transactions from a CSV file
connectManualUploadCSVDragLabel: Or drag and drop your CSV file here
connectManualAccountsEditorInstructionTe: Add your financial data using the editor below.  To get started, click the following button to add a bank or institution
finBackgroundInstructionText: By understanding your financial background and goals, we can offer personalized advice just for you. This will help you save more and improve your financial well-being.
analyzingDataInstructionText: Svend is analyzing your financial data to give you best advice..
createBudgetCardSavingsDescription: By reducing your discretionary spending by 50%, you could save {{savings}} per month. Your current discretionary spending is {{current}}.
createBudgetCardDiscretionaryDescription: Consider reducing your spending in the {{groupName}} category to help meet your savings goals.
createBudgetFinRecommendationInstruction: We based our recommendations on your recent spending and income.
createBudgetCreateBudgetingInstructions: Here you can set your monthly budget for each spending group.  You can also toggle "Advance Mode" to set a specific amount for each category.

dependents.label: Do you have any dependents (children, elderly parents, etc.)?

maritalStatus.label: What is your current marital status?

incomeLevel.label: What is your approximate annual income?

savingsLevel.label: How much do you currently have in savings?

financialGoals.label: What is your primary financial goal?
financialGoals.donateToCharityOrTitheRegularly: Donate to charity or tithe regularly

goalTimeline.label: When do you want to achieve your primary financial goal?

monthlyContribution.label: How much can you realistically contribute toward your goal each month?
